I am Venice and I have BNW and G&K, plus all the other DLC I'm gonna get Beyond Earth as soon as it comes out.
My first multiplayer match effectively ruined single-player for me, so now I mostly do matches with a few other people and use Sweden to play diplomat.
Play Byzantines for faith healing. Get air repair. You aircraft heal a large amount every turn.

Why is this not in my subscription box!!!!

Anyhoo.My strategy usually involves playing extremely aggressively.By 2000bc I'm already most of the way through a war,most likely sieging the capital.Then I move on to city states,any which are allied to my next target(the strongest Civ) have to go....fast.After they have no more allies I go into military overdrive,spending all the money and production on the best military and going all out on them.If I have enough manpower the Civ is reduced to rubble within 10 or less years.I tend to focus on being the most technologically advanced,sometimes this goes as far as modern armor versus horseback.

In my last playthrough on an island map of 8 I removed the Ottoman empire,whom were the second most powerful,within a space of 10 turns(after the army arrived).They attacked one of my babby states and I fended off an invasion with a battleship and the city itself,waiting for the army of modern armor,rocket tanks,and battleships to arrive from the opposite side of the map after finishing off the Iriquois.Once they got there there was no ottoman military left bar a few infantry and carnivals who had become trapped in my territory.the invasion was quick and I hadn't lost any units bar the battleship which protected the city state.

I usually play the American civilization.I my strategy is first make a B-line on wonders ,All cities on production focus,Expand as fast as I can,save gold ,and build military ,and a large workforce.Not the best of all strategies ,but It is my best one I got that works very well.Speaking of that playing single player scenario Smoking skies I so far become the largest Militaristic power taking out two civs ,and finish.However, I have continued on ,and so far eruch civ is the most annoying civ as they continue to settle even though the lost half there cities.
